articles.title: Withdrawal of U.S. Forces from S. Korea Is Requirement of Times: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman
U.S. Forces Accused of Their Crimes against Humanity in South Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Forces Accused of Their Crimes against Humanity in South Korea
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Measure Council for Human Rights in South Korea released an inquiry report on Monday bringing to light the thrice-cursed crimes against humanity and human rights abuses perpetrated by the U.S. aggressor forces for the past 70 years since they occupied south Korea on September 8, 1945. 
					 The report dealt with the hideous moves of the U.S. aggressor forces to infringe upon the political freedom and rights of the south Korean people.
					
					 Noting the U.S. forces that landed in south Korea under the mask of "liberator" and "protector" completely stamped out the political freedom and rights of the south Korean people by enforcing a fascist military administration, a follow-up of the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule over Korea, the report said:
					
					 The criminal nature of the U.S. military administration to stamp out the political freedom and rights of the south Korean people was clearly evidenced by the fact that it forcibly dissolved the people's committees, progressive political parties and social organizations and brutally suppressed their peaceful rallies and demonstrations.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists dissolved at least 162 political parties and social organizations at the point of bayonet from September, 1945 to late 1949.
					
					 They brutally suppressed the just anti-U.S. actions of the south Korean people not to tolerate the colonial rule by the U.S. including the peasants' uprising on Haui Island, South Jolla Province and a peaceful demonstration of workers of the Hwasun Coal Mine in August, 1946, the September general strike and the October popular resistance that year.
					
					 The fascist rule of the U.S. military administration found a vivid manifestation in the fact that it mercilessly violated suffrage of the south Korean people to establish a unified democratic, independent and sovereign state and cruelly killed broad popular masses opposed to its moves to establish a neo-colonial ruling system. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces massacred more than a million patriots and innocent people for five years from the liberation of Korea on August 15, 1945 till the outbreak of the Korean War. 
					
					 They suppressed at the point of bayonet the political freedom and rights of the south Korean people in a bid to maintain their colonial ruling system in the postwar period, too. 
					
					 It is well known to the world that the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces were the arch criminals who militarily backed on the spot the military fascist junta in brutal crackdown upon the righteous struggle of the south Korean people for independence, democracy and reunification including the April 19 Popular Uprising in 1960 and the May 18 Kwangju Popular Uprising in 1980. 
					
					 The inquiry report disclosed the unprecedented massacre committed by the U.S. imperialists not only in the northern half of Korea but also in every part of south Korea during the Korean War. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggression forces committed indiscriminate massacre across south Korea in a deliberate and planned way during the Korean War in utter disregard of elementary human ethics and international law.
					
					 A typical example of it was the indiscriminate bombing and strafing of more than 400 innocent inhabitants in Rogun-ri, Yongdong County, North Chungchong Province in July 1950.
					
					 During the three-year war the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces mercilessly killed more than 1.24 million peaceable people in south Korea only.
					
					 During the war the U.S. imperialists dropped germ shells in different parts of south Korea to massacre people there and even after the war they used germ weapons and poisonous chemical weapons, committing unprecedented mass-killings.
					
					 A particular mention should be made of their secrete introduction of anthrax germ, dangerous lethal weapon with 95 percent of fatality, to south Korea and their use of south Koreans as guinea pigs for experiments. This was the thrice-cursed crime against humanity aimed to inflict disaster and pain not only on the Korean nation but on other peoples of the world.
					
					 The report also referred to the crimes against humanity committed by GIs in south Korea. 
					
					 They are a group of murderers who shot to death south Koreans regarding them as moving hunting targets, and a group of immoral and corrupt men who made no scruple of wantonly violating the rights, dignity, chastity and even physical lives of south Korean women at will.
					
					 GIs turned one million south Korean women into their sexual playthings, a hideous crime against humanity.
					
					 Damage GIs did by raping south Korean women and turning them into sexual playthings amounted to more than 100 billion U.S. dollars as of early in the 2000s when calculated with the reparation for the sexual slavery enforced by the Imperial Japanese Army as a standard.
					
					 GIs turned south Korean land into their military bases and staged anti-DPRK war exercises, playing havoc with the ecological environment and seriously jeopardizing lives and security of its people. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces are creating all sorts of social evils through drug traffic, smuggling and sale, obliterating the national culture by spreading their corrupt Yankee culture and deliberately vandalizing and looting even precious cultural treasures of the Koreans without hesitation.
					
					 GIs' hideous crimes are occurring almost every day. But the criminals are allowed to be at large and keep committing such horrible crimes, enjoying extraterritorial privileges under the SOFA, a modern version of slave document.
					
					 The crimes committed  by the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea against humanity and human rights are too many to enumerate.
					
					 The south Korean people can never be free from the colonial slavery as long as no day passes without seeing bitter tears of the people and pro-U.S. lackeys ride roughshod in the area where foreign forces lord it over and sovereignty is trampled down. This is the bitter lesson taught by the history of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces' occupation, concluded the report.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Brazilian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Brazilian President
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Monday sent a message of greeting to Dilma Vana Rousseff, president of the Federative Republic of Brazil, on the occasion of the 193rd anniversary of its independence.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Brazil would grow stronger and wished the Brazilian president greater success in her responsible work for the stability and progress of the country.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Greets Brazilian FM
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Greets Brazilian FM
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, foreign minister of the DPRK, Monday sent a message of greeting to his Brazilian counterpart Mauro Luiz Lecker Vieira on the occasion of the 193rd anniversary of the independence of Brazil.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished the Brazilian foreign minister greater success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Flood-afflicted Area in Rason City
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Flood-afflicted Area in Rason City
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the flood-afflicted area in Rason City.
					 Going round several places of the afflicted area, he took measures for all units which started the recovery campaign true to the intention of the Party to stabilize the people's living as early as possible and preferentially provide materials for the recovery.
					
					 He also toured Farm No. 1116 and the Ryuwon Shoes Factory.
					
					 The consultative meeting convened on the spot discussed the issues arising in spreading and massively cultivating the "Aegukphul", a feed crop with high yield and nutritive value, across the country and measures for remodeling the factory as required by the new century.

articles.title: Ri Ryong Nam Back Home
articles.content:
Ri Ryong Nam Back Home
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Ri Ryong Nam, minister of External Economic Relations, and his party came back home Monday after taking part in the Oriental Economic Forum held in Vladivostok of Russia.

articles.title: Brazilian Ambassador Gives Reception
articles.content:
Brazilian Ambassador Gives Reception
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Brazilian Ambassador to the DPRK Roberto Colin gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club Monday on the occasion of the 193rd anniversary of the independence of Brazil.
					 Present there on invitation were Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong, Pak Kun Gwang, vice department director of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Kwang Gun, vice-minister of External Economic Relations, So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who doubles as chairman of the DPRK-Brazil Friendship and Cultural Association, officials concerned, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here. 
					
					 The Brazilian ambassador in his speech reiterated the stand of the Brazilian government to develop the bilateral relations and cooperation with the DPRK. 
					
					 He hoped that the DPRK would achieve great success in the scio-economic development under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The DPRK foreign minister in his speech said that the Brazilian government and people have achieved economic stability and sustainable development and expanded foreign relations under the leadership of President Dilma Vana Rousseff.
					
					 The DPRK government will as ever set store by the friendly and cooperative relations with Brazil and make positive efforts to boost the bilateral relations in various fields, he noted.

articles.title: Cuban State Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Cuban State Delegation Leaves
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- A state delegation of the Republic of Cuba headed by Miguel Diaz-Canel Bermudez, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, first vice-president of the Council of State and first vice-president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, left here for home on Monday.
					 It was seen off at Pyongyang International Airport by Ri Su Yong, foreign minister, Ri Kwang Gun, vice-minister of External Economic Relations, So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, officials concerned and staff members of the Cuban embassy here.

articles.title: Human Rights Abuses in U.S. and West Disclosed
articles.content:
Human Rights Abuses in U.S. and West Disclosed
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Association for Human Rights Studies on Monday released a report on human rights abuses in the U.S. and the West to disclose the countries where genuine human freedom and rights are wantonly violated.
					 There are increased efforts of nations to ensure genuine human rights in all fabrics of social life worldwide.
					
					 But the U.S. releases "country reports on human rights" every year groundlessly criticizing many countries of the world over their human rights records while styling itself "a human rights judge."
					
					 The U.S. and its followers, pretending to be "human rights champions", are openly putting political pressures and interfering in the internal affairs of selected countries under the pretext of "guarantee of human rights".
					
					 A typical example is the despicable "human rights" racket targeting the DPRK.
					
					 Through the anti-DPRK human rights racket the U.S. and its followers foolishly seek to tarnish the dignified image of the DPRK and furthermore, undermine the ideology and bring down social system chosen by its people.
					
					 The U.S. should be punished before any other countries for being the world's worst human rights abuser.
					
					 The report roundly exposes the serious human rights abuses baffling human imagination in the West, the U.S. in particular.
					
					 The report cited detailed facts to analyze and comment on the criminality and absurdity of human rights abuses in the U.S. and the West targeting specified groups in all fabrics of social life including politics, economy, ideology and culture, on the basis of international law and norms on human rights.
					
					 It also proves that those human rights abuses are an inevitable product of reactionary human rights system and unpopular human rights policy of the U.S. and the West, not just an accidental act of individuals and organizations.
					
					 The six-chapter report was worked out in collaboration with several institutions, social bodies and organizations, academic organizations and human rights experts in various fields in the country.
					
					 Chapter 1 deals with political freedom and rights. It analyzes on the basis of detailed facts to what discrimination and restrictions people are subject in thinking, religion, speech, media, assembly, demonstration and election in the U.S. and the West painting themselves as "a model of freedom and democracy."
					
					 Chapter 2 refers to cruel torture, violence, terrorism, massacre, flesh traffic, abduction, illegal arrest and detention, etc. in the fields related to civil rights.
					
					 Chapters 3 and 4 prove that human rights are also mercilessly violated in the fields related to socio-economic rights and socio-cultural rights due to starvation, hunger, unemployment and discrimination and healthcare for privileged class, education swayed over by money and power and corrupt lifestyle.
					
					 Chapter 5 says that wanton violation of rights of specified groups finds its manifestation in maltreatment of children, violence against women, discrimination against the disabled and minorities, maltreatment of refugees and xenophobia.
					
					 Chapter 6 proves that racism has become legal and part of policy in the West, in the U.S. in particular, and as a result racist acts and apartheid have been barbarously enforced.
					
					 As mentioned in the report, human rights abuses prevalent in the U.S. and the Western countries are horrible and shuddering and they are a product of inhuman and reactionary view and stand towards human rights and unpopular social system.
					
					 The report will become an indictment exposing the hypocritical nature of the U.S. and the West which are loudmouthed about "protection and promotion of human rights" while advertising "democracy", "law-abiding" and "universality of human rights" and also bringing the world's worst human rights abusers to the human rights tribunal.

articles.title: Vietnamese Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Vietnamese Delegation Arrives
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of Industry and Commerce of Vietnam led by Minister Vu Huy Hoang arrived here Monday.
					 The DPRK government gave a reception in honor of the delegation on the same day.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of Industry and Commerce of Vietnam and home-visiting groups of Koreans in Japan visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Monday.
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Korean Taekwon-Do Team Returns Home
articles.content:
Korean Taekwon-Do Team Returns Home
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The Korean Taekwon-Do Team led by Kim Kyong Ho, chairman of the Korean Taekwon-do Committee, returned home on Sunday after participating in the 19th World Taekwon-Do Championships held in Plovdiv City of Bulgaria.
					 At Pyongyang Railway Station the team was greeted by Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea who doubles as chairman of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, Ro Tu Chol, vice-premier and chairman of the State Planning Commission who doubles as vice-chairman of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, Kim Yong Ho, secretary general of the Cabinet, and officials concerned.
					
					 Members of the team laid bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and made bows to them.

articles.title: DPRK Cabinet Gives Reception in Honor of Taekwon-Do Team
articles.content:
DPRK Cabinet Gives Reception in Honor of Taekwon-Do Team
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Cabinet gave a reception at Okryu Restaurant Monday in honor of the Korean Taekwon-Do team who proved successful at the 19th World Taekwon-Do Championships. 
					 Present there were members of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, officials concerned, players and coaches and their family members.
					
					 Vice-Premier and Chairman of the State Planning Commission Ro Tu Chol who is vice-chairman of the State Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, made a congratulatory speech at the reception.
					
					 He congratulated players and coaches who demonstrated before the world the dignity of the great Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea and the might of the Taekwon-Do country.
					
					 That the DPRK players made great achievements is a precious result brought about by the great love and warm benevolence of Marshal Kim Jong Un, he noted.
					
					 He called upon players and coaches to steadily glorify the victorious tradition of Taekwon-Do.
					
					 Player Sin Jong Hwa in her speech said that Kim Jong Un lavishes on sports persons all kinds of love and trust.
					
					 She vowed to achieve one victory after another in international games.

articles.title: DPRK Team Qualified for 2016 AFC U-16 Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Team Qualified for 2016 AFC U-16 Championship
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The DPRK football team belonging to Group H played matches in Singapore for a berth to the 2016 AFC U-16 Championship from Sept. 2 to 6.
					 The DPRK team played matches with its Thai, Singaporean and Cambodian rivals.
					
					 DPRK men footballers trounced its Thai and Singaporean rivals and defeated Thai rival on Sept. 6.
					
					 The DPRK team placed first in the group, securing a berth to the 2016 AFC U-16 Championship.

articles.title: Agricultural Workers' Dancing Party Held
articles.content:
Agricultural Workers' Dancing Party Held
 Unryul, September 7 (KCNA) -- Agricultural workers had a peasants' dancing party "Hurrah for the Socialist Rural Theses in Our Country!" in Unryul County, South Hwanghae Province Monday on the occasion of the 67th birthday of the DPRK.
					 The dancing party started with "Song of Bumper Crop". The performers presented cheerful dances depicting the happy agricultural workers who work and live in the rural areas now turning into  a good place to work and live thanks to the successful embodiment of the socialist rural theses under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 They presented refined dances, turning round decorative tassels to the tune of famous song "A Bumper Harvest in the Chongsan Plain".
					
					 Songs "Tondollari" and "The Sound of the Cowbell" resounded forth.
					
					 Songs "Our Leader Loved by People" and "Arirang for Thriving Country" revved up the atmosphere of the dancing party.  
					
					 Among the audience were Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea, Pak Thae Sop, secretary of the South Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the WPK, officials concerned and agricultural workers of the county.

articles.title: Presentation of Winners in Vocal and Recital Solo Contest of Youths and Students Held
articles.content:
Presentation of Winners in Vocal and Recital Solo Contest of Youths and Students Held 
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- There took place a presentation of winners in the national vocal and recital solo contest of youths and students at the Central Youth Hall on Monday in celebration of the 67th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK. 
					 Put on the stage of the presentation which began with small chorus "Ode to the Motherland" were various pieces including female solo "The Embrace of My Motherland," masterpiece. 
					
					 The performers highly praised the patriotic exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The performers depicted patriotism of the Korean people, high pride, optimism and delight of youth vanguard in the Songun era devoting their wisdom and enthusiasm at every field of great surge for prosperity of the socialist country. 
					
					 They represented the steadfast will of young Korean people to devote their youth and lives to defending the country. 
					
					 Among the audience were Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the youth league, and its officials, youths and students.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Visits Farm No. 1116
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visits Farm No. 1116
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here Monday visited Farm No. 1116 on the occasion of the 67th birthday of the DPRK.
					 Being briefed on the fact that officials and agricultural workers of the farm are making achievements to greatly contribute to developing livestock farming and improving the standard of the people's living by bringing about a radical turn in seed improvement, members of the military attaches corps went round various places including the room for the education in the revolutionary history, seed research institute and pilot plant.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet
Chongjin, September 7 (KCNA) -- A meeting of foreign crewmen took place at Chongjin Port Monday in celebration of the 67th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					Its participants laid bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Chongjin City, North Hamgyong Province and paid tribute to them.
					
					Present at the meeting were the captain and crewmen of Niue-flagged ship Hao Fan 2.
					
					Speakers referred to the fact that Kim Il Sung, who embarked on the road of revolution in his early years and gained precious experience of building people's power in the crucible of anti-Japanese revolution, founded the DPRK after the liberation of Korea, successfully achieving the historic cause of building a country.
					
					The high international prestige and invincible might of the DPRK and the proud achievements it made in the revolution and construction are associated with the august names of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, they noted, adding:
					
					The DPRK is demonstrating its dignity to the full as a socialist power thanks to the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of the preceding leaders.
					
					They expressed belief that only victory and glory will always be in store for the Korean people led by Kim Jong Un.
					
					A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Apples of Kwail County Supplied to Pyongyang Citizens
articles.content:
Apples of Kwail County Supplied to Pyongyang Citizens 
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- A fleet of trucks carrying apples arrived in Pyongyang Monday from Kwail County.
					 The county brought an unusual bumper harvest this year as they manured and cultivated fruit trees in a scientific and technical way despite unfavorable weather.
					
					 The officials and other working people of the county sent hundreds of tons of well-ripe apples to Pyongyang.
					
					 The citizens passing by waved their hands toward the fleet.
					
					 The fleet arrived at Munsu car park on the bank of the River Taedong before heading for public catering outlets in the city.

articles.title: People's Revolutionary Government, First Power of Juche Type
articles.content:
People's Revolutionary Government, First Power of Juche Type
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- With the 67th birthday (September 9) of the DPRK approaching, its people recall the feats President Kim Il Sung performed for the building of people's revolutionary power.
					 Regarding the problem of power as the main in the revolution, Kim Il Sung set up a new type of people's government during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 It was in the first half of the 1930's that the factionalist flunkeyists dogmatically introduced the leftist Soviet policies in guerrilla zones, disregarding the inhabitants' demand.
					
					 They proclaimed the abolition of private property and brought all personal property under communal ownership. After this sweeping introduction of communal ownership, the Soviet power in the guerrilla zone subjected all its inhabitants to the new order of "communal life". Moreover, they purged the anti-Japanese landowners, even confiscating their property. Their wrong deeds threw the guerrilla zone into an uncontrollable confusion.
					
					 At that time Kim Il Sung had made energetic efforts to straighten out the confused situation and establish a new type of people's power.
					
					 Standing against the establishment of a Soviet-type power improper to Korea's specific conditions, he clarified that a people's revolutionary government of Korean type should be established in the guerrilla zone. After all, a people's power of Juche type run by broad masses appeared in every districts of the guerrilla zone, enforcing democratic reforms.
					
					 This people's government of new type became a prototype of the DPRK, the people's power established in Korea after its liberation from Japan's colonial rule.

articles.title: History: Walled City of Kanggye
articles.content:
History: Walled City of Kanggye
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- In Jagang Province of the DPRK there is a walled township built in the period of the Joson Feudal Dynasty (1392-1910). 
					 This fort was built in 1436 to protect the country from foreign invaders coming in attack from the north, and it was rebuilt in 1555 and 1739.
					
					 The rectangular fort is 4,500 meters in circumference and the height of walls is 3 meters at present, originally 4 to 5 meters.
					
					 In the fort there were four gates, three big ponds, a lot of wells, six pavilions, including Koyon Pavilion for archery practice, and commanding posts.
					
					Preserved there are Inphung Pavilion, one of the eight scenic spots in the northwestern part of Korea, and Mangmi Pavilion.
					
					 The above-said historical sites have turned into a place for inhabitants' relaxation after being restored to their original state under the Workers' Party of Korea's policy of protecting national heritages.

articles.title: Juvenile Crimes Unabated in S. Korea
articles.content:
Juvenile Crimes Unabated in S. Korea
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Juvenile crimes are rampant in south Korea, sparking off a public uproar.
					A 15 year old boy deliberately exploded a gas cylinder at a middle school in Seoul on Sept. 1, according to south Korean MBC.
					
					He had reportedly been disclosed while attempting to set fire on the school with a flame gun in June.
					
					He even posted on internet a video showing his evil doing.
					
					When questioned about the motive, he said he wanted to earn the same ill-fame as the one of the chief criminal who made a shooting spree in the U.S. in 2007.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Fabricating Evidence
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Fabricating Evidence
Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People in an editorial on Sept. 4 denounced the authorities for fabricating evidence to block the probe into the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster.
					The editorial said that the evidence produced by police was proved to be false at a trial of participants of the memorial service for the victims of the Sewol disaster who had been detained on August 25.
					
					The guard section chief of Jongro Police Station in Seoul confessed at the trial that he did not work out the statement submitted to the trial on his behalf as evidence proving the suspicion of the participants of the service and it was confirmed that the seal on it belonged to the section chief a decade ago, the editorial noted, adding:
					
					The prosecution used the evidence forged by police for prosecuting a lawyer belonging to the Bar Association for Democratic Society on the suspicion of attending the memorial service. This was an illegal act caused by the unreasonable investigation conducted to block the thorough probe into the truth about the disaster.

articles.title: Delegation of Union of Korean Students in Japan Meets with Former Unconverted Long-term Prisoner
articles.content:
Delegation of Union of Korean Students in Japan Meets with Former Unconverted Long-term Prisoner
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Members of a delegation for marking the 70th anniversary of the formation of the Union of Korean Students in Japan led by Kim Hyon Il, chairman of its Central Standing Committee, met with Ri Kong Sun, pro-reunification patriotic fighter and former unconverted long-term prisoner, on Monday.
					 Ri Kong Sun said that he fought against fascist hangmen unyieldingly even behind the bar in south Korea for several decades.
					
					 He could maintain the faith in the life-or-death confrontation as he kept in his mind the trust in the Workers' Party of Korea and the leader, he noted.
					
					 He became the DPRK Hero and a winner of the National Reunification Prize under the care of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He called upon the members of the delegation to uphold the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un faithfully.

articles.title: Russian Media Give Wide Publicity to Performance Given by State Merited Chorus and Chongbong Band
articles.content:
Russian Media Give Wide Publicity to Performance Given by State Merited Chorus and Chongbong Band
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Russian media gave wide publicity to the news that performances were given by the State Merited Chorus together with the Chongbong Band for guests of honor before full house in Moscow on Aug. 31 and Sep. 1.
					 Zvezda TV in a program airing the scenes of the performance given by the Korean artistes said:
					
					 It was a rare fortune for Russians to enjoy the performance given by the State Merited Chorus in Moscow.
					
					 What should be emphasized, in particular, is that the performance joined the minds of the peoples of the two countries as one both in name and reality as it was staged in the year of Russia-DPRK friendship.
					
					 The chorus and band on a performance tour in Russia are the most prestigious art organizations in the DPRK.
					
					 The Russian paper Rossiskaya Gazeta said:
					
					 The performance for guests of honor was given by the State Merited Chorus together with the Chongbong Band at the Musical Hall Named after Tchaikovsky.
					
					 The Korean artistes won enthusiastic applause of the audience during their performance because they gripped hearts of Russians.
					
					 When the Russian song "Day of Victory" and Korean song "We Will Go to Mt. Paektu", both carrying special meanings for the two peoples, resounded forth, the whole audience warmly responded to them.
					
					 This was a clear proof that the performance made a great contribution to the development of the friendly relations between the two countries.
					
					 Other leading media of Russia conveyed detailed accounts of the performances given before full house.

articles.title: Seminars Held in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Seminars Held in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in foreign countries on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 They were held by the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Romania, branches under the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and Indonesian Adita Ariya Prawira Ship Company from Aug. 31 to Sep. 3.
					
					 The chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Romania in his speech said that Sept. 9 is a significant day when President Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people, proclaimed the founding of the DPRK before the world.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The Korean people could enter the road of building a new life as the genuine masters of the state and society thanks to the DPRK's founding.
					
					 It is the fruition of the leadership of the President and leader Kim Jong Il that the DPRK is highly demonstrating its dignity and might before the world as the socialist power independent, self-supporting and self-reliant in defense.
					
					 The exploits performed by the great leaders in building Korean-style socialism and strengthening it will be immortal in the hearts of the Korean people.
					
					 The chief of the Addis Ababa Kolfe Branch praised the President for building the country, saying that he pioneered the road of building the people's power for defending and realizing the interests of the popular masses of various circles from the stand of independence.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Figures
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- There took place meetings in Denmark, Iceland, Poland and South Africa from August 28 to September 2 on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 Displayed there were photos documenting the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed were books and photos introducing the glorious course covered by the DPRK.
					
					 Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, said in his speech that the President embarked on the road of revolution in his early years, fathered the Juche idea, led the great anti-Japanese war to victory and achieved the historic cause of the country's liberation.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The President turned the DPRK into the powerful socialist state centered on the popular masses.
					
					 The DPRK which followed the victorious road under the leadership of the President and Kim Jong Il is advancing more vigorously thanks to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Jon Arni Halldorsson, general secretary of the Iceland-DPRK Friendship and Cultural Society, said that the founding of the DPRK was a historic event which brought about the fundamental turning point for carving out the destiny of the Korean people.
					
					 Jacech Poniewierski, first vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Poland-Korea Association, and other figures highly praised the President as the father of the country and the founder of socialist Korea.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting held in Denmark.

articles.title: Anti- U.S. Demo Staged in Britain
articles.content:
Anti- U.S. Demo Staged in Britain
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- A demonstration demanding a halt to the U.S. moves to provoke a new war, U.S. troops' pullout from south Korea and democracy in the society of south Korea was staged in front of the U.S. embassy and the south Korean embassy in London on August 31 under the co-sponsorship of the  New Communist Party of Britain, the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist), Korean Friendship Association UK, the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea.
					 Demonstrators distributed handouts exposing the danger of the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises to the pedestrians.

articles.title: Levantadas en Nampho estatuas de bronce de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Levantadas en Nampho estatuas de bronce de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
Nampho, 6 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Quedaron levantadas las estatuas de bronce de los grandes lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en la ciudad de Nampho.
					Tuvo lugar el dia 6 la ceremonia de descubrimiento de las estatuas de bronce.
					
					Participaron alli Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el secretario jefe del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la ciudad de Nampho, el presidente del Comite Popular de la Ciudad de Nampho y otros funcionarios correspondientes.
					
					Las estatuas fueron descubiertas por los cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado, el ejercito y de la susodicha ciudad.
					
					Ante las estatuas fue colocado un cesto de flores a nombre del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Tambien fueron puestos un cesto de flores a nombre comun del Comite Central del PTC, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el otro a nombre de los ciudadanos de Nampho.
					
					Luego, fueron depositados los otros a nombre de los organismos del partido y el poder, entidades de masas, organos, empresas, fabricas, granjas y universidades a todos los niveles de la ciudad, las unidades del EPC y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, etc.
					
					Todos los participantes rindieron sublime homenaje a los grandes lideres ante sus estatuas.
					
					El discurso de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC.
					
					El orador dijo que el levantamiento de las estatuas de bronce de los grandes lideres en la ciudad es un acontecimiento de gran importancia para glorificar generacion tras generacion sus sagradas vidas y hazanas revolucionarias.
					
					Recordo que los lideres antecesores realizaron visitas de orientacion a la ciudad conduciendo sabiamente las labores de la ciudad en conjunto.
					
					Dijo que gracias al Mariscal se llevo a la realidad el deseo de todos los habitantes de la ciudad de levantar las estatuas de bronce de los grandes lideres.
					
					Llamo a todos a enaltecer al Presidente y al Dirigente como eternos lideres y Sol del Juche, y luchar vigorosamente por la construccion de un Estado prospero y la victoria final de la causa revolucionaria del Juche uniendose mas compactamente en torno al CC del PTC encabezado por el Mariscal.
					
					Tras escuchar las explicaciones sobre las estatuas de bronce, los participantes las recorrieron.

articles.title: Retiro de tropas norteamericanas de Sur de Corea es urgente demanda de la epoca, apunta portavoz de MINREX de RPDC
articles.content:
Retiro de tropas norteamericanas de Sur de Corea es urgente demanda de la epoca, apunta portavoz de MINREX de RPDC
Pyongyang, 7 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del aniversario 70 de la ocupacion del Sur de Corea por las tropas norteamericanas, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 7 una declaracion como sigue:
					  Desde la ocupacion del Sur de Corea por las tropas norteamericanas hasta hoy, EE.UU. ha venido cometiendo persistentemente las imprudentes maniobras hostiles tendentes a perpetuar la division de Corea y aplastar la RPDC a contrapelo de la unanime aspiracion de todo el pueblo coreano a la paz y la reunificacion.
					
					  Detras de la guerra y todos los conflictos armados ocurridos durante 70 anos en la Peninsula Coreana se encuentra EE.UU. que estaciona durante largo tiempo sus fuerzas armadas de gran tamano y recurren a las acciones militares de caracter provocativo.
					
					  Los simulacros EE.UU.-Sur de Corea sirven de una causa principal que exacerba la confrontacion y desconfianza no solo entre la RPDC-EE.UU. sino tambien entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					
					  En la actualidad, esta peligrosa farsa belica entra en la etapa extremadamente imprudente de perfeccionar e impulsar en la practica el guion de ataque preventivo y sorpresivo contra la RPDC como OPLAN 5015 recien publicado.
					
					  La ocupacion de las tropas norteamericanas en el Sur de Corea sirve de un motivo para los ejercicios belicos de agresion que se libran seguidamente en el Sur de Corea  contra la RPDC.
					
					  EE.UU. necesita el pretexto para el aumento de las fuerzas armadas segun la "estrategia de reequilibrio" de Asia-Pacifico tendente a dominar el mundo.
					
					  Para este fin, desarrolla periodicamente las acciones militares provocativas para mantener siempre la tension en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Mientras EE.UU. estacione en el Sur de Corea sus tropas de gran tamano y tome el derecho de mando supremo del ejercito surcoreano, las relaciones Norte-Sur de Corea se veran obligadas a recibir la influencia de EE.UU.
					
					  Hoy en dia, se presenta como demanda impostergable de la epoca retirar a las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea de acuerdo con la resolucion de la 30a reunion de la Asamblea General de la ONU.
					
					  Puesto que el Norte y el Sur de Corea demostraron a todo el mundo la capacidad de superar la crisis muy tirante y defender la paz entre los connacionales, es inaceptable la excusa vieja de la "ocupacion" de las tropas norteamericanas para "asegurar la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana".

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju averigua zonas de danos por inundacion en ciudad de Rason
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju averigua zonas de danos por inundacion en ciudad de Rason
Pyongyang, 7 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, estudio en el terreno zonas de danos por inundacion en la ciudad de Rason.
					Al recorrer varios puntos de la region devastada, Pak tomo medidas para que las unidades participantes en la restauracion estabilicen cuanto antes la vida del pueblo y suministren con prioridad los materiales necesarios para la rehabilitacion, en acato al espiritu del Partido.
					
					El premier recorrio tambien la granja no. 1116 y la Fabrica de Calzados Ryuwon.
					
					En las reuniones consultivas efectuadas en el terreno, fueron debatidos los problemas para expandir por todo el pais y cultivar masivamente la "hierba Aeguk", planta forrajera de alto rendimiento de cosecha y de alto valor nutritivo, y se tomaron medidas para remodelar la Fabrica de Calzados Ryuwon segun la demanda del nuevo siglo.

articles.title: Parte de regreso delegacion estatal de Cuba
articles.content:
Parte de regreso delegacion estatal de Cuba
Pyongyang, 7 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Partio el dia 7 de esta capital la delegacion estatal de la republica de Cuba encabezada por Miguel Mario Diaz Canel Bermudez, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba y primer vicepresidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros.
					La despidieron en el Aeropuerto Internacional de Pyongyang el canciller Ri Su Yong, el viceministro de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero, Ri Kwang Gun, el vicepresidente del Comite de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, So Ho Won, y otros funcionarios coreanos, asi como los miembros de la sede diplomatica cubana en la RPDC.

articles.title: Asociacion de Estudio de Derechos Humanos de Corea revela crimenes anti-DDHH de EE.UU. y el Occidente
articles.content:
Asociacion de Estudio de Derechos Humanos de Corea revela crimenes anti-DDHH de EE.UU. y el Occidente
Pyongyang, 7 de septiembre (ACNC) -- La Asociacion de Estudio de Derechos Humanos de Corea (AEDHC) publico el dia 7 el informe sobre los crimenes anti-DDHH de EE.UU. y otros paises occidentales. 
					Hoy dia, se aumentan los esfuerzos de los paises para asegurar los autenticos derechos humanos en todas las esferas de la vida social.
					
					Pero, EE.UU. inventa cada ano a sus caprichos el "informe sobre la situacion de derechos humanos de cada pais" como si fuera el "juez de DDHH". 
					
					Y ejerce junto con los paises satelites la presion politica y comete la intervencion en los asuntos internos de los paises seleccionados. 
					
					A citar un ejemplo, arma el grosero alboroto de "DDHH" contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Mediante la campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC, EE.UU. y sus satelites se desesperan absurdamente por manchar la imagen prestigiosa de este pais socialista y derrocar la ideologia y regimen optados por el pueblo coreano. 
					
					EE.UU., violador de DDHH mas barbaro del mundo, es el primer pais a ser castigado. 
					
					El informe de la AEDHC revela la situacion miserable de DDHH en los paises occidentales, en particular, en EE.UU.
					
					Al referir con datos concretos los crimenes de violacion de derechos humanos que cometen EE.UU. y los paises occidentales contra los colectivos especificos y en todos los dominios de la vida social como la politica, la economia, la ideologia y la cultura, analiza su caracter criminal e injusto en virtud de los reglamentos internacionales de DDHH. 
					
					Argumenta que tales crimenes no son actos casuales de algunas personas o entidades individuales sino son resultados inevitables del regimen reaccionario y la politica antipopular de aquellos paises en materia de derechos humanos. 
					
					El informe fue elaborado en colaboracion con varios organos, entidades sociales y organizaciones, organismos academicos y los especialistas en los derechos humanos de varios dominios del pais. 
					
					El informe consta de 6 capitulos.
					
					El capitulo I analiza en detalles que en cuanto a la libertad y los derechos politicos, en EE.UU. y los paises occidentales que se autodenominan como modelos de la "libertad y democracia", se discriminan, se restringen y se violan la ideologia, religion, palabra, prensa, mitin, asociacion y  elecciones.
					
					El capitulo II critica que en el dominio de los derechos civiles se cometen abiertamente las torturas y violencias crueles, terrorismo y matanza, trafico y secuestro de seres humanos, arresto y encarcelacion ilicitos, etc. 
					
					Los capitulos III y IV denuncian que en los dominios de los derechos socioeconomicos y socioculturales se ven pisoteados los derechos humanos por el hambre, penuria, desempleo, discriminacion, servicios medicos para los privilegiados, educacion plutocratica, el modo de vida corrupta, etc. 
					
					El capitulo V notifica que la violacion de los derechos de colectivos especificos se expresa concentradamente en el maltrato a los ninos, violacion a las mujeres, discriminacion a discapacitados y minorias, injuria a los refugiados y xenofobia. 
					
					El capitulo VI revela que en los paises occidentales, en particular, en EE.UU., esta legalizada y politizada la discriminacion racial. 
					
					Como narra el documento, los actos de violacion de DDHH en EE.UU. y los paises occidentales son horrorosos crimenes de lesa humanidad causados por el criterio y posicion inhumanitarios y reaccionarios sobre los DDHH y por el regimen social antipopular. 
					
					El informe de la AEDHC sobre los crimenes anti-DDHH de EE.UU. y otros paises occidentales pondra al desnudo el aspecto hipocrita de estos paises que abogan por la "proteccion y fomento de DDHH" preconizando la "democracia", la "legalidad" y la "universalidad de los derechos humanos" y acusara a los paises criminales al tribunal de DDHH.

articles.title: Sociedad de Medidas de DDHH en Sur de Corea revela crimenes de tropas de EE.UU. de 70 anos
articles.content:
Sociedad de Medidas de DDHH en Sur de Corea revela crimenes de tropas de EE.UU. de 70 anos
Pyongyang, 7 de septiembre (ACNC) -- La Sociedad de Medidas de DDHH en el Sur de Corea de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 7 un reporte sobre los crimenes antieticos y anti-DDHH cometidos por las tropas norteamericanas durante 70 anos desde el 8 de septiembre de 1945 cuando dejaron sus primeras botas en el territorio surcoreano. 
					Ante todo, el documento revela la brutal represion a la libertad y derechos politicos de los habitantes surcoreanos.
					
					Al ocupar el suelo surcoreano con la mascara de "libertadoras" y "protectoras", las tropas norteamericanas exterminaron la libertad y los derechos politicos de la poblacion surcoreana mediante la gobernacion militar fascista continuando el sistema de dominacion colonial del imperialismo japones. 
					
					Para ese fin, disolvieron a fuerza los comites populares, los partidos democraticos, las entidades sociales y organizaciones y reprimieron salvajemente los mitines y manifestaciones pacifistas. 
					
					Desde septiembre de 1945 hasta finales de 1949 disolvieron a bayonetas 162 partidos politicos y entidades sociales. Y reprimieron de manera bestial la sublevacion de campesinos del islote Haui de la provincia de Jolla del Sur y la manifestacion pacifista de los obreros de la mina de carbon de Hwasun, desarrolladas en agosto de 1946, la huelga general de septiembre y el levantamiento popular de octubre del mismo ano y otras luchas antiyanquis de la poblacion surcoreana. 
					
					La dominacion fascista del cuartel general de la administracion militar norteamericana se expreso en haber infringido el derecho electoral de los habitantes surcoreanos de establecer un Estado democratico, independiente y soberano y asesinado cruelmente a los moradores que rechazaban el sistema de dominacion neocolonial. 
					
					Durante un lustro despues de la liberacion de Corea (15 de agosto de 1945) hasta antes del estallido de la guerra coreana, los uniformados norteamericanos asesinaron a mas de un millon de patriotas y civiles inocentes.
					
					En el tiempo posbelico tambien reprimieron a bayonetas la libertad y los derechos politicos de la poblacion surcoreana para mantener el sistema de dominacion colonial. 
					
					El mundo conoce que las tropas norteamericanas ampararon con armas a la camarilla titere militar surcoreana a reprimir la justa lucha de la poblacion surcoreana aspirante a la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion incluso la sublevacion popular del 19 de abril de 1960 y el levantamiento popular de Kwangju del 18 de mayo de 1980. 
					
					El reporte revela las matanzas horribles cometidas por los yanquis no solo en la extension norcoreana sino tambien por doquier del Sur de Corea en el periodo de la pasada guerra coreana. 
					
					Sin tener en consideracion la etica y moralidad elementales ni la ley internacional, los uniformados norteamericanos cometieron premeditadamente las matanzas indiscriminadas en toda la extension del suelo surcoreano en el tiempo de la  pasada guerra coreana. 
					
					A citar un ejemplo, en julio de 1950 perpetraron les asesinaron con bombas y ametralladores en la comuna de Rogun del distrito de Yongdong de la provincia de Chungchong del Norte, dejando como saldo mas de 400 muertos inocentes. 
					
					Durante tres anos de la guerra, mataron solo en el Sur de Corea a mas de un millon 240 mil civiles pacifistas.
					
					En aquellos tiempos lanzaron las bombas bacteriologicas por doquier del suelo surcoreano para matar a los habitantes, y en el tiempo posbelico utilizaron las armas biologicas y quimicas toxicas. 
					
					Introdujeron a puertas cerradas en el Sur de Corea los bacilos de antracosis con 95 % de efectividad y realizaron hasta los experimentos con habitantes surcoreanos vivos,  lo cual es el intolerable crimen de lesa humanidad tendente a acarrear de nuevo los incontables sufrimientos y desgracias a la nacion coreana y la humanidad. 
					
					Ademas, los uniformados norteamericanos mataron a tiros a los habitantes surcoreanos considerandolos como objetos de caza y blancos vivos. 
					
					Violaron brutalmente los derechos humanos, la dignidad y hasta la castidad y vida fisica de las mujeres surcoreanas.
					
					Las bestias yanquis convirtieron a un millon de mujeres surcoreanas en sus esclavas sexuales. 
					
					Los danos causados por la violacion sexual de los uniformados norteamericanos hasta principios de la decada de 2000 llegaron a mas de cien mil millones de US$, segun la norma de indemnizacion por el crimen de la esclavitud sexual para el viejo ejercito japones. 
					
					Los uniformados norteamericanos destruyeron el ambiente ecologico del Sur de Corea y violaron la vida y la seguridad de los habitantes construyendo las bases militares y desarrollando los ejercicios belicos anti-RPDC. 
					
					Ademas, los uniformados norteamericanos fomentan los males sociales de toda indole como el narcotrafico, exterminan la cultura nacional difundiendo la otra corrupta a estilo yanqui y destruyen y saquean sin escrupulos los preciosos patrimonios culturales de la nacion coreana. 
					
					Se cometen diariamente las atrocidades de las tropas norteamericanas, pero los criminales no se castigan en virtud del "Acuerdo Administrativo", documento esclavista de version moderna, sino disfrutan del privilegio extraterritorial. 
					
					Son incontables los crimenes antieticos y anti-DDHH de los efectivos norteamericanos cometidos en el Sur de Corea. 
					
					Mientras predominan las fuerzas extranjeras pisoteando la soberania nacional y actuan como duenos los vendepatrias y pronorteamericanos, la poblacion surcoreana no podra liberarse nunca del destino de esclavos. Esto es la leccion que ensena la trayectoria de ocupacion del Sur de Corea por las tropas norteamericanas.
